data.title: World Famous Software MCQs with Answers
data.meta_description: Welcome to the World Famous Software MCQs with Answers. In this post, we are sharing World Famous Software Multiple Choice Questions
data.text:
Welcome to the World Famous Software MCQs with Answers. In this post, we are sharing World Famous Software Multiple Choice Questions and Answers in World General Knowledge section for various competitive exams in Pakistan. Find practice World Famous Software practice test with answers here. Each question offers a chance to enhance your knowledge regarding World Famous Software MCQs Online Test.

Which software is an open-source operating system known for its distributions like Ubuntu and CentOS?

a) Windows

b) macOS

c) Linux

d) Unix

Answer

c) Linux

Which software suite includes applications like Word, Excel, and PowerPoint and is widely used for document processing and presentations?

a) Adobe Creative Suite

b) Microsoft Office

c) Google Workspace

d) LibreOffice

Answer

b) Microsoft Office

What programming language is commonly used for web development and is known for its simplicity and ease of use?

a) Python

b) C++

c) Java

d) HTML

Answer

d) HTML

Which open-source database management system is known for its reliability and is often used in web applications?

a) PostgreSQL

b) Oracle Database

c) Microsoft SQL Server

d) MySQL

Answer

a) PostgreSQL

This software is a popular, open-source content management system (CMS) used for creating websites and blogs.

a) Drupal

b) WordPress

c) Joomla

d) Magento

Answer

b) WordPress

Which software is a free and open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation?

a) Chrome

b) Safari

c) Firefox

d) Edge

Answer

c) Firefox

What is the name of the version control system used for tracking changes in source code, known for its distributed nature?

a) Git

b) Subversion

c) Mercurial

d) CVS

Answer

a) Git

This software is an open-source relational database management system, known for its speed and efficiency.

a) PostgreSQL

b) SQLite

c) MongoDB

d) Cassandra

Answer

b) SQLite

What software is a popular, open-source graphics editing program used for tasks like photo manipulation and graphic design?

a) Adobe Photoshop

b) GIMP

c) Illustrator

d) CorelDRAW

Answer

b) GIMP

Which open-source operating system is primarily designed for mobile devices and is based on the Linux kernel?

a) Windows Mobile

b) iOS

c) Android

d) Blackberry OS

Answer

c) Android

This software is a widely used platform for web application development and is known for its robustness and scalability.

a) Ruby on Rails

b) Django

c) Laravel

d) Spring Framework

Answer

a) Ruby on Rails

What is the name of the virtualization software that allows multiple operating systems to run on a single host system?

a) VMware

b) VirtualBox

c) Hyper-V

d) KVM

Answer

b) VirtualBox

Which software allows users to create and run virtual machines on their computers and is available as an open-source solution?

a) VMware

b) VirtualBox

c) Parallels Desktop

d) Xen

Answer

b) VirtualBox

What open-source, cross-platform integrated development environment (IDE) is widely used for programming in languages like Java and C++?

a) Visual Studio

b) Eclipse

c) NetBeans

d) Xcode

Answer

b) Eclipse

Which software is a popular, open-source office suite with applications like Writer, Calc, and Impress?

a) Microsoft Office

b) Google Workspace

c) LibreOffice

d) Apache OpenOffice

Answer

c) LibreOffice

This software is an open-source, vector graphics editor used for creating illustrations and graphics.

a) Adobe Illustrator

b) CorelDRAW

c) Inkscape

d) Affinity Designer

Answer

c) Inkscape

What is the name of the open-source web server software that is widely used to serve web pages on the internet?

a) Apache HTTP Server

b) Nginx

c) IIS (Internet Information Services)

d) LiteSpeed

Answer

a) Apache HTTP Server

This open-source, cross-platform text editor is known for its extensibility and is popular among developers.

a) Notepad++

b) Sublime Text

c) Visual Studio Code

d) Atom

Answer

c) Visual Studio Code

Which software allows for the creation, editing, and management of databases and is widely used by developers?

a) MySQL

b) PostgreSQL

c) Microsoft Access

d) SQLite

Answer

a) MySQL

What software is an open-source, high-performance NoSQL database often used in big data applications?

a) MongoDB

b) Redis

c) CouchDB

d) Cassandra

Answer

a) MongoDB

This software is a widely used, open-source operating system based on the Unix-like GNU project.

a) macOS

b) Windows

c) Linux

d) Android

Answer

c) Linux

What software is a popular, open-source e-commerce platform used for building online stores?

a) WooCommerce

b) Shopify

c) Magento

d) BigCommerce

Answer

c) Magento

Which software is a widely used, open-source relational database management system known for its performance and scalability?

a) MySQL

b) PostgreSQL

c) SQLite

d) Oracle Database

Answer

a) MySQL

This open-source, cross-platform web development framework is known for its simplicity and efficiency.

a) Angular

b) React

c) Vue.js

d) Laravel

Answer

d) Laravel

What is the name of the open-source, cloud-based office suite that includes applications like Docs and Sheets?

a) Microsoft Office

b) Google Workspace

c) LibreOffice

d) Zoho Office

Answer

b) Google Workspace

This open-source software is a version control system known for its ease of use and collaboration features.

a) Git

b) Subversion

c) Mercurial

d) CVS

Answer

a) Git

What software is an open-source, cloud computing platform known for its flexibility and scalability?

a) Azure

b) AWS (Amazon Web Services)

c) Google Cloud

d) OpenStack

Answer

d) OpenStack

This open-source software is a popular content management system (CMS) used for building websites and online applications.

a) Drupal

b) WordPress

c) Joomla

d) Magento

Answer

a) Drupal

Which software is a popular, open-source web browser developed by Google?

a) Chrome

b) Safari

c) Firefox

d) Edge

Answer

a) Chrome

What software is an open-source, cross-platform text editor known for its minimalistic design and speed?

a) Notepad++

b) Sublime Text

c) Visual Studio Code

d) Atom

Answer

b) Sublime Text

This software is a popular, open-source programming language known for its readability and simplicity.

a) Python

b) Java

c) C++

d) Ruby

Answer

a) Python

What is the name of the open-source, relational database management system often used for web applications and known for its ease of use?

a) MySQL

b) PostgreSQL

c) SQLite

d) Oracle Database

Answer

a) MySQL

This open-source, content management system (CMS) is known for its flexibility and is often used for creating a wide range of websites.

a) Drupal

b) WordPress

c) Joomla

d) Magento

Answer

a) Drupal

Which software allows for the creation, editing, and management of databases and is known for its ease of use and portability?

a) MySQL

b) PostgreSQL

c) Microsoft Access

d) SQLite

Answer

d) SQLite

What is the name of the software framework that is widely used for developing mobile applications for iOS and macOS?

a) Android Studio

b) React Native

c) Xcode

d) Flutter

Answer

c) Xcode

This open-source, cross-platform integrated development environment (IDE) is popular for Java development.

a) Visual Studio

b) Eclipse

c) NetBeans

d) Xcode

Answer

b) Eclipse

What software is an open-source, high-level programming language known for its flexibility and versatility?

a) Python

b) C++

c) Java

d) Ruby

Answer

d) Ruby

This software is a popular, open-source database management system known for its speed and simplicity.

a) PostgreSQL

b) SQLite

c) MongoDB

d) Cassandra

Answer

b) SQLite

What open-source software platform is used for the deployment and management of containerized applications?

a) Kubernetes

b) Docker

c) OpenShift

d) Mesos

Answer

b) Docker

This open-source, high-performance web server software is known for its speed and scalability.

a) Apache HTTP Server

b) Nginx

c) IIS (Internet Information Services)

d) LiteSpeed

Answer

b) Nginx

What is the name of the open-source, cross-platform office suite that includes Writer, Calc, and Impress?

a) Microsoft Office

b) Google Workspace

c) LibreOffice

d) Apache OpenOffice

Answer

c) LibreOffice

This open-source, cross-platform text editor is known for its extensibility and is popular among developers.

a) Notepad++

b) Sublime Text

c) Visual Studio Code

d) Atom

Answer

c) Visual Studio Code

a) WooCommerce

b) Shopify

c) Magento

d) BigCommerce

Answer

c) Magento

This open-source software is a web framework used for building interactive web applications.

b) React

c) Vue.js

d) Laravel

Answer

a) Angular
